passages.text:
**sun
@eon_wakeUp_human @sfx_yawn
Sun is rising, birds chirping already calling for the new day.
Eon slowly opened her eyes to a shiny morning.
Eon: <color="blue">"What a lovely day to spend at the garden!"</color>
She wakes up saying the same thing every morning.
[[Human|Breakfast]]
passages.name: In The Garden

passages.text:
**sun
@eon_walk_human @sfx_whistle
Eon: <color="blue">"A good day starts with good breakfast!"</color>
She walks through the garden browsing the fruit trees.
Eon: <color="blue">"Hmm, what shall I eat this morning? Pears or oranges? Or maybe some apricots?"</color>
[[Human|Peach]]
passages.name: Breakfast

passages.text:
**peach
@eon_happy_lion
Her search stops when her eyes spotted a juicy peach. @sfx_snake
Eon: <color="blue">"On, here is my breakfast!"</color>
As she is reaching to grab it, a mysterious voice confronts her.
Voice: <color="red">"Arghh, same ridiculous routine every morning. Aren't you bored yet?"</color> 
[[Lion|Come Out]]
[[Ox| Who]]
[[Human|Where]]
passages.name: Peach

passages.text:
**exxMark
@eon_unhappy_lion
Eon:<color="blue">"Who is dis? Show yourself!"</color> 
Voice:<color="red">"I see you are a little stressed. Sorry for interrupting your lil' boring breakfast routine."</color> @sfx_snake
Eon:<color="blue">"I said come out!"</color>
[[Lion|Anxious]]
passages.name: Come Out

passages.text:
**questionMark
@eon_anxious_ox
Eon didn't expect anyone else to be around. And she doesn't recognize the voice.
Eon: <color="blue">Who is it?</color>
Serpent: <color="red">Just someone who is bored of watching the same silly routine every morning.</color>
[[Ox|Explain]]
[[Lion|Anxious]]
passages.name: Who

passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_lookAround_ox
She is looking around but seeing no one.
Eon:<color = "blue">"What do you mean?"</color>
Voice:<color = "red">"Ah, poor child...Every morning, you get up, thinking it's the perfect day to spend in the garden. Then you try to decide between fruits for your breakfast, and end up grabbing a peach."</color>
[[Ox|Please]]
passages.name: Explain

passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_lookAround_ox
Eon is still searching for the owner of the mysterious voice.
Eon: <color = "blue">"That is not true, I just had an apple yesterday."</color>
The voice laughs hysterically. sfx_evilLaughter
Voice:<color = "red">"Oh, it only breaks my heart to see you like this. What a silly child you are!"</color>
[[Ox|Up]]
passages.name: Please

passages.text:
**eyes
@eon_lookAround_ox
Eon:<color = "blue">"Can you please reveal yourself? You are making me anxious."</color>
Voice:<color = "red">"Oh, that is the last thing I'd like to do!"</color>
Eon hears a slow crouching sound first. Then an uneasy, deep sound she never heard before follows. 
Voice:<color = "red">"Look up you fool!"</color>
As Eon moves her gaze upwards, she sees two bright eyes in between leaves.
The eyes slowly slide down around the tree's trunk.
[[Ox|Serpent]]
passages.name: Up

passages.text:
**serpent
@eon_surprised_ox @sfx_snake
Eon has never seen something like this before.
Eon:<color = "blue">"What are you? You look nothing like me or any creature I've seen before."</color>
Serpent:<color = "red">"I am the Serpent. I've been living here in the shadows, observing you and your fake routine every day."</color>
[[Ox|Why]]
passages.name: Serpent

passages.text:
**dialogue
@eon_lookAround_lion
Eon is searching for a face but can't see anyone around.
Voice: <color="red">"You don't need to be anxious, kid!"</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"I am not anxious! But it seems like you are since you're hiding yourself from my sight."</color> 
Voice: <color="red">"Well, I need to warn you. If I come out, you'll need to face the bare truth. Do you think you're ready for that?"</color>
[[Lion|No Fear]]
[[Ox|Explain]]
passages.name: Anxious

passages.text:
**dialogue
@eon_angry_lion
Eon: <color = "blue">"I have no fear of you or what you can tell me. Just come out and show me your face!"</color>
Voice:<color = "red">"Okay. You asked for it."</color>
Eon hears a slow crouching sound first. Then a subtle deep sound. @sfx_snake
[[Lion|Hi]]
passages.name: No Fear

passages.text:
**serpent
@eon_surprised_lion
A long and narrow body slowly slides down on the tree's truck.
Eon has never seen a creature like this before.
Eon:<color = "blue">"What are you exactly?"</color>
Serpent:<color = "red">"Hi kid, I am the Serpent. And I am here to wake you up from this ridiculous dream."</color>
[[Lion|Straight]]
[[Ox|Why]]
passages.name: Hi

passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_confused_ox
Eon: <color = "blue">"But I don't understand. You don't know me. Why do you care?"</color>
Serpent has a suspicious spark in his eyes.
Serpent:<color = "red">"Because they have been lying to you. And I believe you deserve better than that."</color>
[[Ox|About]]
[[Eagle|Deserve]]
passages.name: Why

passages.text:
**dialog
Eon feels chills on her body.
Eon:<color = "blue">"What are they lying about?"</color>
Serpent pauses for a moment. He seems to enjoy this conversation though. 
He whispers in devilous tunes. 
Serpent:<color = "red">"Your whole life."</color>
[[Ox|No]]
passages.name: About

passages.text:
**recycle
@eon_think_ox
Eon:<color = "blue">"How do you know I deserve better? Again, YOU DON'T KNOW ME."</color>
Serpent:<color = "red">"You are smart kid. I like that. That's true, but I know your father. I know his intentions. He is making you live the same day over and over again. You are trapped in this prison forever!"</color>
[[Eagle|Tell me]]
[[Ox|No]]
passages.name: Deserve

passages.text:
**apple
@eon_think_eagle
Eon:<color="blue">"And what are his intentions with this? Why is he making me live in a loop?"</color> @sfx_creepyWhisper
Serpent whispers with a devilous smile.
Serpent:<color="red">"He doesn't want you to taste the apple."</color>
[[Eagle|Apple]]
passages.name: Tell me

passages.text:
**dialog
This sounds just too horrible to be true. @eon_disagree_ox
Eon: <color="blue">"No! He wouldn't do that! He loves me!"</color>
The serpent rolls his eyes.
Serpent:<color="red">"Ah, the things we do for love... Though, I think that expressions if for a different context."</color>
[[Ox||Loops]]
passages.name: No

passages.text:
**recycle
@eon_disappointed_lion
Eon:<color = "blue">"I am tired of your games. Just tell me what's happening."</color>
Serpent seems to enjoy Eon's impatience.
Serpent:<color = "red">"It breaks my heart to say this, but your whole life here has been a lie. You made believe that time is linear and moving forwards. Every day is a new one, they made you think. But in reality, you've been waking up to the same morning every day, going through the same sequence of events, over and over again. Like that peach you picked today. You've been eating a peach for breakfast since you were born."</color>
[[Lion|Lying]]
[[Eagle|Tell me]]
passages.name: Straight

passages.text:
*apple
@eon_angry_lion
Eon feels a rising fire inside.
Eon: <color="blue">"That is not true. You are lying!"</color>
Serpent:<color = "red">"I'm not. Why would I do that?"</color>
Eon: <color = "blue">"I don't see why they would care to stage this in the first place."</color>
Serpent: <color = "red">"Because they don't want you to taste the apple."</color>
[[Lion|Away]]
[[Eagle|Apple]]
passages.name: Lying

passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_disappointed_lion
Eon: <color = "blue">"Just go away, I can't deal with your nonsense anymore."</color>
Serpent looks uncomfortable.
Serpent:<color = "red">"It's not nonsense! I am telling you the truth! I am trying to save you!"</color>
[[Lion|Walk]]
[[Eagle|Warning]]
passages.name: Away

passages.text:
**apple
@eon_confused_eagle
Nothing the Serpent claims makes any sense to Eon.
Eon:<color="blue">"What is special about the apple? It's just another fruit."</color>
Serpent:<color="red">"No, that is not true. Apple contains a very special ingredient that will open up your senses. When you have it once, you can never go back."</color>
[[Eagle|Before]]
[[Ox|Prove]]
[[Lion|Away]]
passages.name: Apple

passages.text:
**questionMark
@eon_confused_human
This was quite unexpected.
Eon: <color="blue">"Who is talking to me? Where are you?"</color>
Voice: <color="red">"Just a friendly stranger who is notorious to stand up against injustice."</color>
[[Human|Face]]
[[Ox|Explain]]
[[Lion|Anxious]]
passages.name: Where

passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_lookAround_human
Serpent:<color = "red">"So, you wanna see my face. Very well. I'm coming down."</color>
As Eon is scanning every corner in sight, she hears leaves rustling on the peach tree. She looks up, sees a long and thin creature crawling down around the trunk of the tree.
Serpent:<color = "red">"Hello Eon. Nice to meet you."</color>
[[Human|Hello]]
[[Ox|Serpent]]
passages.name: Face

passages.text:
**serpent
@eon_confused_human @sfx_snake
Eon: <color = "blue">"Hello...But...Who are you?"</color>
Eon's eyes are examining every inch on the Serpent's body.
Serpent:<color = "red">"I am the Serpent, child. No need to worry. I am your friend. And I am here to end the game played to you."</color>
Eon:<color = "blue">"Game?"</color>
Serpent:<color = "blue">"You've been living a lie this whole time."</color>
[[Lion|Straight]]
[[Ox|Why]]
passages.name: Hello

passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_talk_eagle
Eon has more questions.
Eon:<color="blue">"So you are saying that my memory of eating the apple is false."</color>
Serpent:<color="red">"Yes, exactly!"</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"And if I eat the apple, I'll change forever."</color>
Serpent:<color="red">"Correct."</color>
[[Eagle|Outcast]]
passages.name: Before

passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_think_eagle
Eon:<color="blue">"Did you have it before?"</color>
Serpent: <color="red">"Yes, that's why I am here now telling you the truth."</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"Why were you hiding in the tree?"</color>
Serpent lowers his voice.
Serpent:<color="red">"Because I am actually not allowed to be here. They kicked me out after I disobeyed him and ate the apple."</color>
[[Eagle|Trick]]
passages.name: Outcast

passages.text:
**questionMark
@eon_suspicious_eagle
The direction this conversation is headed sounds extremely suspicious to Eon.
Eon:<color="blue">"So, I'll be kicked out as well. Why would I do that?"</color>
Serpent:<color="red">"To live free of course! Make a life of your own!"</color>
[[Eagle|Warning]]
[[Lion|Walk]]
passages.name: Trick

passages.text:
**warning
@eon_anxious_eagle
Eon: <color="blue">"Guards!"</color>
Serpent looks to Eon in shock. 
Serpent:<color="red">"What the..."</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"Sorry pal, but I warned you."</color>
[[Eagle|Cherubs]]
passages.name: Guards

passages.text:
**nightstick
@eon_disappointed_eagle @sfx_flute
Two cherubs appear next to the Serpent.
Serpent:<color="red">"Oh man, not again..."</color>
Cherub1:<color="deeppink">"Well, I agree! You gotta stop coming back in. You don't belong here."</color>
Cherub2:<color="forestgreen">"Hey, I think you're good here so I'm just gonna go."</color>
Cherub1:<color="deeppink">"Okay man, no worries."</color>
[[Eagle|Bye]]
passages.name: Cherubs

passages.text:
**exxMark
@eon_disappointed_eagle
One of the cherubs grabs the serpent. 
Cherub1:<color="deeppink">"Thank you for calling us. I hope he didn't disturb you much with his nonsense."</color>
Eon:<color="blue">"I'm okay. Thank you for coming."</color>
The Serpent screams as they take him away.
Serpent:<color="red">"THIS IS NOT OVER YET!"</color>
[[Eagle|Worm]]
passages.name: Bye

passages.text:
**apple
@eon_think_eagle
Eon takes a look at the apple.
Reaches and grabs one. Smells it.
Eon:<color="blue">"Hmm, smells good."</color>
Then she sees a worm peeking out of the apple.
[[Eagle|Nah]]
[[Ox|Only]]
passages.name: Worm

passages.text:
**peach
@eon_nah_eagle @sfx_whoosh
Eon:<color="blue">"Nah!"</color>
And she throws the apple away.
Eon:<color="blue">"I'll just have a peach instead."</color>
So, she lived in the garden, forever, happily ever after.
@end
passages.name: Nah

passages.text:
**exxMark
Eon:<color="blue">"You are lying! I don't believe a single thing you say!"</color> @sfx_shortOfBreath @eon_anxious_ox
The serpent seems very confident. 
Serpent:<color="red">"If you are so sure, then prove it. Just take a bite from the apple, and we'll see who is lying."</color>
Eon is panthing. She can't decide. She knows it's a lie, but she is scared at the same time.
[[Ox|Okay]]
[[Eagle|Before]]
[[Lion|Walk]]
passages.name: Prove

passages.text:
**recycle
@sfx_snake @eon_dance_ox
Serpent:<color="red">"Listen to me, kiddo. You are stuck in a loop. Living the same day forever. And all this nonsense exists to keep you away from the apple. Because if you eat the apple, you'll be aware. And you'll be free from this pretty prison."</color>
[[Ox|Prove]]
[[Eagle|Apple]]
[[Lion|Away]]
passages.name: Loops

passages.text:
**tick
Eon can't stand the idea that the creator is a liar. She knows he is not.
@eon_disappointed_ox
Eon:<color="blue">"Okay! I accept your challenge. I'll eat the apple, and prove to you that my dad is an honest person."</color>
[[Ox|Decide]]
passages.name: Okay

passages.text:
**exxMark
@eon_walk_lion
Eon:<color = "blue">"We're done here."</color>
The serpent panics as Eon walks away.
Serpent:<color = "red">"No, no! Wait!"</color> 
He jumps and grabs Eon's leg.
[[Lion|Scream]]
passages.name: Walk

passages.text:
**dialog
@eon_disappointed_eagle
Eon:<color="blue">"Nothing you say makes any sense to me. I am happy here. And I don't know you. Please leave or I'll call the guards."</color>
Serpent:<color="red">"You are not listening! This is not happiness, you are just numb!"</color>
[[Eagle|Guards]]
passages.name: Warning

passages.text:
**explosion
@eon_scared_lion @sfx_fluteBroken
Eon is scared as hell. She stars screaming. @sfx_scream
Eon:<color = "blue">"GET AWAY FROM ME!!!"</color>
In panic, she kicks on the Serpent's head. Multiple times.
Serpent:<color = "red">"ARGHHHHH!!!"</color>
[[Lion|Sorry]]
passages.name: Scream

passages.text:
**dead
@eon_surprised_lion @sfx_fluteBroken
Poor Serpent's head is smashed.
Eon looks at him in shock. 
Eon:<color = "blue">"Omg...Omg! I am so sorry. I didn't mean to..."</color>
Eon realizes there was nothing else to do. In shock, she calls the guards.
[[Lion|Criminal]]
passages.name: Sorry

passages.text:
**cry
@eon_cry_lion @sfx_whistleFlute
The cherubs take the Serpent's body away as the chief consolates Eon.
Chief:<color = "deeppink">"It's not your fault. Stop blaming yourself. And you should know that he is an unwelcomed guest we've been looking for everywhere. You actually helped us."</color>
Eon is in tears.
[[Lion|Gift]]
passages.name: Criminal

passages.text:
**peach
@eon_eat_lion @sfx_bite
Eon:<color = "blue">"But what was his crime?"</color>
Cherub1:<color = "deeppink">"Don't bother yourself with these details right now. You already had an exhausting day."</color>
They grab a peach from the tree and throw it to Eon.
Cherub1:<color = "deeppink">"Here, have something to eat. You must be starving."</color>
Eon looks at the peach. It reminds him of the dead serpent now. Why did he had to attack her like that.
Then she takes a bite and the juice makes her forget everything.
@end
passages.name: Gift

passages.text:
**apple
Eon and the Serpent walks to the apple tree. Eon can barely breathe. 
She grabs an apple from the tree. @eon_anxious_ox
Eon:<color="blue">"Looks so shiny and smells really good."</color>
Serpent:<color="red">"I know! So, do you dare to learn the truth?"</color>
[[Ox|Dare]]
[[Eagle|Logic]]
passages.name: Decide

passages.text:
**apple
Eon is having second thoughts. But she just hates the idea of father lying to her. @eon_eat_ox
Eon:<color="blue">"Okay, here I come!"</color>
She she takes a big bite from the apple.
The serpent's smile covers his whole face. Than he disappears.
[[Ox|Hit]]
passages.name: Dare

passages.text:
**think
Eon doesn't say anything. @eon_think_eagle
She is still making calculations in her head.
Eon:<color="blue">"If he is right, somehow, I doubt that would make my life any easier. and it is already beautiful, I love it here."</color>
[[Eagle|Outcast]]
[[Ox|Dare]]
passages.name: Logic

passages.text:
**explosion
First she thinks that it's the most beautiful taste she ever sensed.
Then she gets a very sudden headache. As if there were a thousand bombs exploding in her head all at the same time.
She starts screaming. @eon_scared_ox @sfx_explosion
Eon:<color="blue">"ARGHHHHH!!!"</color>
[[Ox|Bent]]
passages.name: Hit

passages.text:
**explosion
The colors and shapes started to bend. She freaks out and screams louder.
She feels like falling in void. @eon_fall_ox
She loses sense of time. 
Falling for an indefinite time, she finally lands on ground. 
The ground lights up. It becomes so bright that she goes blind.
Her feels her mind is opening up. She is feeling emotions she never felt before. She knows now that dad lied to her.
[[Ox|Crashing]]
passages.name: Bent

passages.text:
**explosion
She kept crashing into rocks, waves, flowers and spiders. @eon_passedOut_ox
Last thing she saw was a grave of her own. And she didn't know they existed before. 
So, she opens up her eyes again as a different person.
[[Ox|Dizzy]]
passages.name: Crashing

passages.text:
**exxQuestion
Her head is filled up with so many things that she didn't know existed before. @eon_dizzy_ox
Eon: Oh, my head! It hurts.
As she is trying to get herself up, she realizes the ground is all sand.
Then a soft voice from her back speaks to her.
Adam:<color="firebrick">"Hey? Are you okay?"</color>
[[Ox|Adam]]
passages.name: Dizzy

passages.text:
**dialog
She looks back in confusion. @eon_confused_ox
It's another person, like her, and they have a comforting expression on his face.
Eon:<color="blue">"Who are you?"</color>
Adam:<color="firebrick">"Oh sorry, I am Adam."</color> 
[[Ox|Same]]
passages.name: Adam

passages.text:
**dialog
Adam seems like a friendly person, Eon tells herself. @eon_surprised_ox
Adam: <color="firebrick">"Did you come from the Garden as well?"</color>
This question surprised Eon.
Eon: <color="blue">"Yes...But how did you know that?"</color>
Adam: <color="firebrick">"Well...That's also where I came from."</color>
[[Ox|Answer]]
passages.name: Same

passages.text:
**recycle
Is he telling the truth? That's hard for Eon to tell. @eon_think_ox
Eon:<color="blue">"But...I've never seen you there. How is that possib..."</color>
She realizes that she was actually stuck in a loop just like the Serpent said. Forever. Waking up into the same day over and over again. So, it was possible they missed each other.
Adam's smile is full of compassion.
Adam:<color="firebrick">"I think you know the answer."</color>
[[Ox|Loneliness]]
passages.name: Answer

passages.text:
**apple
Adam: <color="firebrick">"Since I ate the apple, I started to feel emotions that I never had before. Loneliness, feeling alone, that's new and it was very hard to deal with."</color> @eon_think_ox
Eon doesn't understand how but she somehow knows what loneliness would be like.
Adam:<color="firebrick">"So, I've been walking around everyday to run into someone, somehow. And today is the day."</color>
[[Ox|Hungry]]
passages.name: Loneliness

passages.text:
**blueApple
~~
Eon is thirsty. At that moment, she realizes they are in the middle of a desert. @eon_confused_ox
Eon: <color="blue">"Where are we? This is the middle of nowhere!"</color>
Adam: <color="firebrick">"Don't panic! There is a small lake nearby where we can rest, have some water and food."</color>
Eon's stomach grumbles as Adam is speaking.
Adam: <color="firebrick">"Oh, you must be hungry! Here, I have another apple for you."</color>
He gives Eon a bright blue apple.
[[Ox|Together]]
passages.name: Hungry

passages.text:
**heart
Adam holds Eon's hand. @eon_happy_ox
Adam: <color="firebrick">"Come on, hold on to me. And we'll make it there together."</color>
Eon gets up holding on to Adam. It suddenly feels really good to have someone around. 
They walk together towards the horizon. They don't let go of each other's hands.
@end
passages.name: Together

passages.text:
Serpent's words about the creator echoes in Eon's mind. 
Eon knows that there is only one way to know if the Serpent was telling the truth.
Eon:<color="blue">""What's there to lose anyway?"</color>
So, she bites the apple.
[[Ox|Hit]]
passages.name: Only
